name: Hopper & Clyde
description:
Entry for 2021.1 Brackey's game jam.

Hopper and Clyde team up to save their loved ones. Clyde is a hardened outback veteran who knows how to get around. Hopper is a baby... with a gun! Fight your way through poachers as you chase down the one that snatched up your kin. 

I tried my best with the limited time I had(~12 hours), I learned a lot along the way, I never did one of these solos before(though I still only did one before). No doubt there are some bugs and some balancing issues, not to mention I couldn't even get a UI done :( I tried my best to make this game challenging yet beatable. Go easy on the graphics I'm not much of an artist and made an attempt to make all the graphics myself. same with sound.

Platformer/bullet hell.
